definitions.text: a hollow globule of gas (e.g., air or carbon dioxide)
a speculative scheme that depends on unstable factors that the planner cannot control
examples: his proposal was nothing but a house of cards
he didn't want to burst the newcomer's bubble

definitions.text: a dome-shaped covering made of transparent glass or plastic
flow in an irregular current with a bubbling noise
rise in bubbles or as if in bubbles

examples: In China it is polite to burp at the table
